name: zooty
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having a bright, fashionable style or manner that gets you a lot of attention: There's a large, zooty terrace restaurant on the top floor of the hotel. They said that a prize would be given to the person in the zootiest suit.
More examplesFewer examplesAll the kids in the country seem to go wild over some sulky guitar player in a zooty suit.The car has sleek, zooty styling that will get you noticed on the street. The models strutted the runway in the latest zooty prints and stylish dresses.
